fields.name: Depends on how much you use Palatial.
fields.value:
Palatial is consumption based and credits can be purchased pay as you go, or through monthly subscriptions.

Projects are free to upload, and every new sign up comes with $80 of credits included for free. Stream credits are used to view your project on a browser, and export credits (calculated based on on the size of your upload file) are used to download your project as an optimized UE5 project.

fields.name: ⏺️ Pay-as-you-go
fields.value:
> Subscription cost: $0
> Export credits: $60/GB
> Stream time: $20/hr

fields.name: ⏺️ Basic subscription
fields.value:
> Subscription cost: $99/month
> Included export credits: 2GB/month
> Included stream time: 5hrs/month

fields.name: ⏺️ Pro subscription
fields.value:
> Subscription cost: $499/month
> Included export credits: 30GB/month
> Included stream time: 20hrs/month
